Package utilities

Class LogHandler

java.lang.Object
utilities.LogHandler
public abstract class LogHandler
extends java.lang.Object
Handle recording login attempts to a file.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    (package private) static class  LogHandler.logState  

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    static java.util.logging.Logger log

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    LogHandler()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void log​(java.lang.String username)
    passes the log state information to the file.
    static void logUnknownUsernameLogin​(java.lang.String username)
    sends the information to the file when user enters a username that was not registered in the database.
    static void logUserLoginFailure​(java.lang.String username)
    sends the information to the file when user enters incorrect password
    static void logUserLoginSuccess​(java.lang.String username)
    sends the information to the file when user correctly input both username and password.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • log

      public static void log​(java.lang.String username)
      passes the log state information to the file.
      Parameters:
      username - the username field from the login screen.

    • logUserLoginSuccess

      public static void logUserLoginSuccess​(java.lang.String username)
      sends the information to the file when user correctly input both username and password. If the user could not login within first attempt, number of attempts is written to the file.
      Parameters:
      username - from the username field of the login screen

    • logUserLoginFailure

      public static void logUserLoginFailure​(java.lang.String username)
      sends the information to the file when user enters incorrect password
      Parameters:
      username - from the username field of the login screen

    • logUnknownUsernameLogin

      public static void logUnknownUsernameLogin​(java.lang.String username)
      sends the information to the file when user enters a username that was not registered in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - from the username field of the login screen
